description:
Corrected WIllie's portion on 35-36 and 65-66.  Big thank you to Rob Arnold for helping me figure out this riff a few years ago.

I don't know much else of this song but wanted to share it since I always thought it was the best part.
title: Terror And Hubris In The House Of Frank Pollard
